title: Hour 1: Who's Built Ford Tough?
description:
Ron Magill joins us for a trip through the animal kingdom. Then, Amin on the Clippers and Kawhi Leonard's health, Mike Schur is here to share his Brooklyn Nets Stat of the Day, and a discussion on Bryan Harsin's firing, Jimbo Fisher, and the SEC pressure cooker.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
